arStrings.szText:
{c_label}Cooldown:{/c} {c_resource}{Cooldown Time}{/c} seconds
Subo scatters {c_number}{SF_8}{/c} explosive traps that each arm after {c_number}[{SF_10}|1|]{/c} |4second;seconds. When an enemy moves within range of one, it explodes for {if:SF_16}{c_number}{payload:TRAP_DAMAGE}{/c}{else}massive{/if} Physical damage and Knocks Down enemies for {c_number}[{SF_11}|1|]{/c} |4second;seconds.
